description: This file defines Express.js route handlers for managing user progress in an LMS backend, including lesson completion, user progress retrieval, and course completion with instructor notification.

methods.name: POST /progress/lessons/:lessonId/complete
methods.description: Handles lesson completion recording for learners.

methods.name: GET /progress/users/:userId
methods.description: Retrieves lesson completion count and IDs for a specific user (manager view).

methods.name: POST /progress/courses/:courseId/complete
methods.description: Records course completion for a learner and attempts to notify the instructor.
